entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
